archimate:DataObject.name: Ledger-Wide Tombstone
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A Tombstone marked across the entire Sovrin Ledger so that it is no longer returned by any Node in response to requests for read access. Mutually exclusive with Node-Specific Tombstone.
